name: Elemen-die
description:
You have inherited your grandfather's greatest invention: The elemental die.

The evil wizard Grorj has been trying to harness that ancient power.

Storm his estate. Defeat the Grorjulons. 

Vanquish Grorj.

This game was created for the Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam 2022 in 48 hours. I developed this project solo in Unity 2020 and used some tools that are credited in the "credits" in the game.

WASD to move

Left Click to Fire

Right Click to Recall

There will be points where you cannot "Recall".

This was made fairly quickly so I apologize for some possible bugs/sequence breaking and incomplete visual content.  The game also has no sound as of this upload

Enjoy Elemen-die!
